phrases.phrase:
Checks users instant messenger version
{%P}{%command} user

Manages room subject.
{%P}{%command} [-a|-p] [temat]
-a człon - Appends subject chunk after '|', -p człon - Prepends subject chunk before and separates it by '|'.
If no arguments given - displays room subject.

Clears room log, so new users can't see any old messages.
{%P}{%command} [count] [-m message] [-s silence mode]
Configuration variables: base:defaultClearCount "5" base:defaultClearMessage "\0"

Tells bot to join specified room.
{%P}{%command} room [nick]

Tells bot to leave specified room.
{%P}{%command} [room=this room]

Sends message with specified message.
{%P}{%command} message

Lists users on room using specified pattern.
{%P}{%command} [pattern]
Tags that you can use in pattern: %c - Room, %n - Nick, %a - Affiliation, %r - Role, %p - Access Level, %j - Jid, %s - Show status, %d - Text status, %t - Time that the user has spent on a channel.
Example: {%P}{%command} "%n - %s"
Will give result like that: Admin - Available Bot - Available
Configuration variables: base:defaultUserPattern "%n - %a [%r] %s"
